 A syllogism inference from two biconditionals.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
syl5bb.1 $e |- ( ph <-> ps ) $.
syl5bb.2 $e |- ( ch -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
syl5bb $p |- ( ch -> ( ph <-> th ) ) $.
